After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.EXPLANATION: Measure of the overall efficiency of the distribution network, based on factors like cost, time, and reliability.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.FORMULA: Average Efficiency Score of the Distribution Network

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.EXPLANATION: Percentage of deliveries made within the agreed-upon time frame compared to the total number of deliveries, reflecting the effectiveness of the distribution network.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Deliveries / Total Number of Deliveries) * 100

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to distribute each unit of product through the network, including transportation, warehousing, and administrative expenses.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.FORMULA: Total Distribution Cost / Total Units Distributed

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.KPIS: Distribution network coverage area expansion rate.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.EXPLANATION: Rate at which the distribution network’s coverage area is expanded, measured by the growth in geographic or market reach.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.FORMULA: (Current Coverage Area - Previous Coverage Area) / Previous Coverage Area * 100

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.EXPLANATION: Percentage of the distribution network’s available capacity that is being used, indicating how effectively the network's resources are utilized.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.FORMULA: (Total Utilized Distribution Capacity / Total Available Distribution Capacity) * 100

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.EXPLANATION: Measure of the dependability and consistency of the distribution network’s performance, based on delivery success rates, errors, and service quality.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.FORMULA: Average Reliability Score of the Distribution Network

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.KPIS: Distribution network carbon footprint reduction rate.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.EXPLANATION: Rate at which carbon emissions from the distribution network are reduced, reflecting efforts to decrease environmental impact.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.FORMULA: (Previous Carbon Footprint - Current Carbon Footprint) / Previous Carbon Footprint * 100

After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.EXPLANATION: Degree to which the distribution network adheres to industry regulations and standards, measured through compliance audits and assessments.
After Sales+Spare Parts Logistics+Distri.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Instances / Total Number of Instances) * 100
